snippet: When a fish market on the Rue des Martyrs closed, the burden of history intensified the neighborhood’s suffering.
abstract: Elaine Sciolino Letter From Paris describes pleasure of shopping on the Rue des Martyrs in Paris; bemoans closing of favorite fish market and notes that drastic gentrification of Rue des Martyrs and surrounding streets in last two decades has hurt traditional merchants.
lead_paragraph: When a fish market on the Rue des Martyrs closed, the burden of history intensified the neighborhood’s suffering.

headline.seo: Historic Street Is Left With a Hole - Letter From Paris
headline.main: On a Historic Street, One That Got Away
headline.print_headline: On a Historic Street, One That Got Away
